Adott oldalhoz esetleges igényelt képek: Upload possible required images for this page
short_description: Ideal choice for concise, quickly reviewable subpages, such as a brief service presentation or a contact page. Contains maximum 2 sections, each with 1 text box and 1 image.
medium_description: This option provides the opportunity to display more detailed information, with sufficient space for a more complex description of a product or service. Can contain maximum 5 images, 5 text boxes and 2 banners, ensuring optimal balance between text and visual elements.
large_description: The most comprehensive choice, perfect for detailed product pages and service presentations that provide thorough information. Can include up to 10 images and 10 text boxes, 5 banners, as well as elements like our benefits section, custom image-text compositions, countdown, what they say about us quotes, reviews, and product and service category integration.
graphics_project_description: Please describe your website project in detail, with a maximum of 20,000 characters. Here you have the opportunity to share with us your ideas about the website's purpose, target audience, desired mood, preferred colors or style, as well as any other relevant information that can help understand the project. Please specify the website's specific functions and localization needs in the separate settings options at the bottom of the page.
graphics_ui_question: Do you already have a ready graphic design or visual design (UI) for your website?
graphics_ui_what_is_title: What is a graphic design / visual design (UI)?
graphics_ui_explanation: A graphic design or visual design (User Interface – UI) presents the visual appearance, layout and user interface of the website before development begins. This includes color schemes, typography, arrangement of images and texts, button appearance, and all visual components that define the user experience, thus providing a kind of digital blueprint for the website.
contact_form_description: A simple web form through which visitors can send messages directly to you through the site without having to leave it.
quote_form_description: Allows interested parties to request detailed quotes for specific products or services, recording all necessary information.
popup_window_description: A popup interface that automatically appears to visitors when certain conditions are met (e.g. on arrival, before leaving), to display attention-grabbing messages or offers.
newsletter_signup_description: A built-in feature that allows visitors to subscribe to your email list to be notified of your news, promotions or updates. The service includes newsletter sending system integration.
search_function_description: A built-in search box that allows visitors to easily find content, products or services within the website.
